item.title: Brownspring Drive and Kelby Path, 14th September
item.description:
The weeds growing up through the paving stones are in a terrible state even growing across the pavements, the verges are very rarely cut and before too long the drains will be blocked by weeds. They need to be dealt with immediately. It seems that Brownspring Drive being the last road in the borough is ignored. I believe this is what we pay for in our Council Tax.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 34, Brownspring Drive, New Eltham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Safety issue as traffic stopped at traffic lights in Southwood Road are given green light to proceed but are immediately confronted at right angles with traffic turning right from Sidcup Road A20 into Green Lane. Vehicles from Southwood Road have to brake suddenly to avoid collision with the vehicles turning right from Sidcup Road A20 into Green Lane at right angles. Southwood Road lights need to be held longer to allow right turning traffic from A20 Sidcup Road to clear the junction., 14th September
item.description:
Safety issue as traffic stopped at traffic lights in Southwood Road are given green light to proceed but are immediately confronted at right angles with traffic turning right from Sidcup Road A20 into Green Lane. Vehicles from Southwood Road have to brake suddenly to avoid collision with the vehicles turning right from Sidcup Road A20 into Green Lane at right angles. Southwood Road lights need to be held longer to allow right turning traffic from A20 Sidcup Road to clear the junction.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southwood Road, New Eltham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Safety issue as traffic stopped at traffic lights in Southwood Road are given green light to proceed but are immediately confronted with blindsided traffic at right angles trying to turn right from Sidcup Road A20 into Green Lane. Traffic from Southwood Road have to brake suddenly to avoid collision with the traffic turning right from Sidcup Road A20. Southwood Road green light needs to be delayed to allow right turning traffic time to clear the issue., 14th September
item.description:
